topics.body:
anybody got any suggestions for good Character Action games?
Revengeance got me in a mood
i know Devil May Cry is good (i'm well aware the remake is terribly received), but as far as i know those ones are apparently very difficult
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540bfaae6368722daccb0000#post_540bfaae6368722daccb0000
Castlevania: Lords of Shadow
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540bfaae6368722daccb0000#post_540bfaae6368722daccb0000
Actually I've heard the remake is good gameplay wise, and a good starting point for stepping onto fast-paced action games like it.

It's new Dante that most people really hate.

Also Castlevanis Curse of Darkness. It's a fun action platformer. Probably the only one pre reboot that got 3D right.
